data.title: Web Applications – Advice from Experts – Clarity
data.text:
Bernd Petak is an advisor, mentor, consultant and investment professional to early and mid-stage internet-driven technology companies and their investors. After eight years as an engineer he graduated with a degree in business Bernd finished a tenure at Deloitte as a partner responsible for the firm’s regional strategy and operations practice. Bernd left Deloitte to found his first startup, a computer game development studio which exited via strategic sale. Since 2006, Bernd has provided strategy and operations advice to numerous technology companies including acting as COO, CFO and CEO to several. Bernd is an active contributor to the early-stage technology community as a mentor for several Vancouver-based accelerators and incubators. He formally advises a number of startups in Vancouver and San Francisco.

Business and startup advisor with a 20+ years experience with software development, sales and marketing. Professional problem-solver. Startups / solopreneurs: I can help you identify and focus on the key thing you need to grow. Established business owner-operators: You've got a good thing going? Let's take it to the next level. I've helped clients to: - Cut ad spend by 50% while growing leadflow - Adjust their offers and marketing positioning to enable 10x growth - Make the right little tweaks to the sales process to significantly shorten the sales cycle and increase the closing rate.

Ian Clarke is a Computer Scientist and Entrepreneur, with a track record of both technical and business innovation, and an outspoken thinker and activist on issues relating to freedom of speech, intellectual property law, and technology. Ian is best known as the founder and coordinator of the Freenet Project; designed to allow true freedom of communication, Freenet was the first decentralized anonymous peer-to-peer network, and a precursor of the “distributed hashtable” data structure. Ian has a degree in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Science and has over two decades of expertise applying machine learning to real world problems in areas as diverse as online dating, advertising, petroleum, and fraud detection.

I am a freelancer specializing in software development and consulting, particularly around web service based businesses. I have built technical teams and products for a number of startups. I've mostly worked with Rails in cloud environments such as AWS, Rackspace, and Joyent. I have more recently been doing a lot with Python and serverless stacks. The industries I have worked in include consulting, investment/securities, e-commerce, recruiting, restaurant analytics, content management, and construction.

Business automation expert with a passion with product design and software/app development. Currently the founder of https://lolly.co I've helped hundreds of business owners re-structure processes and automate the mundane saving on average hundreds of thousands of dollars at a time. I oversee the development of over 10 software and app projects each week and have successfully launched more apps and software products than I can keep track of for our worldwide clients. You can discover more about me via https://danielcooper.im

I started writing code in 2010. At the time, I was a teenager hacking things up for fun. Since then, I've had the opportunity to work on dozens of projects and lead teams of awesome software engineers located all over the globe. I founded a full-stack software studio in 2016 to meet the needs of my freelance clients and satisfy my entrepreneurial hunger. We specialize in web, mobile, and blockchain-enabled solutions for startups and SME's. I became enamored with blockchain and crypto in 2017. I’m particularly interested in Ethereum, smart contracts, and the future of robust decentralized finance (DeFi) products on the blockchain. I am passionate about the fintech space, and have worked in different verticals such as financial services, insurance, and PE/VC. I am currently building data aggregation infrastructure that powers best-in-class insurance experiences much like what exists in the digital banking industry. Feel free to send me an email to discuss how I might be able to help.

Engineering Lead working with government services like Healthcare.gov and Medicare.gov. I am an occasional conference speaker as well as an outspoken proponent of helping people with all backgrounds to get into tech. I have spent my career building experience as an engineer, consultant, and team lead, managing projects that range from simple SMS Campaigns to Multi-Million Dollar ERP projects in a mixture of industries and budgets. Doing so has given me the opportunity to work with engineers and teams with all levels of experience and styles. I can help with Node, React, Firebase, AWS, Containerization with Docker, and Engineering Team Building

I founded different companies. In the last years I focussed on iOS Apps and ASO, growing Dubself and Hypervivo to tens of millions of users. Before that I worked on Web Projects focussing on SEO, and worked in M&A for big companies acquiring startups. Lately I'm also actively doing angel investments as well as buying companies in the digital space. In the future I want to invest my time more to help committed jung entrepreneurs to jump start their startups and avoid the mistakes I made.

Serial tech entrepreneur. Full stack of technology, marketing & business skills to grow startups. Founder & CEO of Xtend.AI - using AI to solve global challenges. Co-founder & CTO of Medindia.net - a global top 20 health website. Founder/CEO of FrontPoint Systems, a web technology solutions company. Areas of expertise: AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, web strategy, product development. Business & Web Strategy, Product Design, Prototyping, Desktop, Web & Mobile Applications and Software Development, Managed Web Hosting, Search Engine Optimization(SEO), Internet Marketing, Social Media strategy. Digital Publishing, Google Adsense/Adwords, Advertising & Affiliate Marketing, E-Commerce, SaaS, Online Revenue Models, Web Analytics and Optimization globally. In the past I also founded Dynapro, a computer systems integrator and VAR, and Pcportable.com – where we designed and sold custom portable computers through the web. I am passionate about technology and helping startups and entrepreneurs succeed.

As the Co-founder and CEO of Unitech Digital Studio, I specialize in crafting custom solutions across a spectrum of technologies. My expertise spans SaaS, AI, web and mobile development, as well as platforms like Shopify and WordPress. With a robust background in eCommerce and IT solutions, I excel in PHP-Laravel, Next.js, React.js, and Bootstrap, delivering innovative and scalable digital experiences.

Hello! I'm Timi, a seasoned WordPress and WooCommerce expert with over 10 years of experience creating, customizing, and troubleshooting websites. Whether you're struggling with a buggy plugin, a theme that won't cooperate, or need to optimize your online store for better performance, I've got you covered. What I Can Do for You: - Fixing WordPress and WooCommerce errors - Customizing themes and plugins to suit your needs - Enhancing website performance and speed - Setting up and optimizing WooCommerce stores - Improving website security and functionality - Guiding best practices and effective tools I've helped countless clients transform their WordPress/WooCommerce websites into efficient, high-performing online platforms. Let me help you take your website to the next level and ensure it runs smoothly and effectively. Ready to get started? Book a call with me today and let's make your WordPress/WooCommerce website the best it can be!

Digital Strategist & Technology Consultant by Profession | Tech Blogger by Passion. Director at Digitalkofi Technologies Limited | Masters In Computer Applications, BA Computer Science & Management, Advanced Digital Marketing, PR, Event Management & Advertisement, Business Management & Administration, Personal Training by Qualification | Geek by Choice A proud Amanfo) *graduate of Prempeh College* Shadrach studied in Ghana and India. After graduating from Wisconsin International University College with a B.A in Computer Science and Management, he worked with FAO – RAF, Accra-Ghana (Food and Agriculture Organization of The United Nations, Regional Africa office) as a Systems Administrator and Procurement Clerk before ending up in India where he pursued a couple of professional courses alongside his masters. I have 12 years of experience in the IT and BPO industry. Jump On Board Lets Power the Digital Economy Together.

As a seasoned Web Application Consultant, I specialize in elevating online businesses to new heights. My portfolio boasts of pivotal roles in significant projects like eobuwie.pl, modivo.pl, vuestorefront.io, and PiwikPro, showcasing my versatility across diverse e-commerce platforms and analytics tools. With a deep understanding of modern web technologies and user experience, I offer strategic insights that drive traffic, enhance user engagement, and boost conversion rates. Hiring me means investing in proven expertise that translates complex web challenges into lucrative business opportunities. My commitment to innovation and excellence makes me an invaluable asset for any ambitious web project.
